entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:59 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Airport 01:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -33.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa steady
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -38.2°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
